title: ratnabhooshaNi
sahitya:
ratnabhUSaNi ratnAmbarE ambA rakta bIja niSUdani ambA



anupallavi



 bhakta jana hrdaya kamalavAsini shakti shaNmukha janani salahau



caraNam



 madhusUdana sahOdari madhu shAlini madhumati mahitE madhura gAna mOdini sadayE

 samudayE sarva bhAgyOdayE shata makhanutE harikEshapura nilayE
